articles.title: Asian Games 2023 Live Updates: India bag medals in shooting and rowing, medal tally begins to grow - The Indian Express
articles.description: Asian Games 2023 Day 1 Live Updates: India clinched its second shooting medal of the day as Ramita won the bronze medal in the women's 10 air rifle final.

Rowing 101
Within rowing are two disciplines - sculling and sweep rowing. In sculling each rower uses two separate oars, one on either side of the boat, while sweep rowers use a single oar each. Com… [+1551 chars]
